template.name: TaskExecution0

query.formula: strategy opt = minE(globalTime + penalty)[<=MAXTIME]{movement0.location, taskExe0.location, iteration[0], tf[0][0],tf[0][1],tf[0][2],tf[0][3],tf[0][4],tf[0][5],tf[0][6],tf[0][7],tf[0][8],tf[0][9]}->{}:<> ((forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i]>=MaxIteration))
